item.title: Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra
item.description: I’m a season ticket holder to the Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra. As much as I enjoy the genre, I’m far from an expert. Starting with the 2023-24 season, I’m going to make playlists in advance and try to be a bit more familiar with the pieces. 2023-2024 Classical Series # September 29, 2023 # Event, Spotify playlist Beethoven: Egmont Overture, Op.84 Puts: Contact Prokofiev: Symphony No. 5 in B-flat Major, Op.100 October 6, 2023 # Event, Spotify playlist

item.title: Big Ten Fight Songs
item.description: I am a lifelong Midwesterner. Fight songs are a big deal in the Big Ten. I played the “Minnesota Rouser” in my high school band in Illinois. “Indiana Our Indiana” is objectively the best, as measured by the fact I have two degrees from there and zero degrees from anywhere else. The conference isn’t as Midwestern as it used to be, but it’s nice to have the 9 10 11 13 17 other songs gathered to sing along with whenever someone scores on Purdue.
